test_cases.comment: Activate shaft brake and check that main clutch and PTI clutch are not blocked.
test_cases.name: Activate shaft brake

test_cases.comment: Shaft brake shall be released and main clutch shall be engaged.
test_cases.name: Main Clutch in

test_cases.comment: Main clutch shall be disengaged and shaft brake shall be activated.
test_cases.name: Main Clutch out

steps.comment: Shaft brake shall be activated when main clutch has been disengaged.

test_cases.comment: Shaft brake shall be released and PTI clutch shall be engaged.
test_cases.name: PTI Clutch in

test_cases.comment: PTI clutch shall be disengaged and shaft brake shall be activated.
test_cases.name: PTI Clutch out

steps.comment: Shaft brake shall be activated when PTI clutch has been disengaged.

test_cases.comment: PTO clutch shall be engaged and shaft brake shall remain activated.
test_cases.name: PTO Clutch in

test_cases.comment: PTO clutch shall be disengaged and shaft brake shall remain activated.
test_cases.name: PTO Clutch out

steps.comment: Shaft brake shall remain activated when PTO clutch has been disengaged.
